subject: p12185775
History: Year old woman with suspected flash edema, heart failure. Now diuresing. , eval for resolving edema.
Impression: Severe cardiomegaly and widened mediastinum are unchanged. Pulmonary edema has markedly improved. Retrocardiac opacities have improved consistent with improving atelectasis and small left effusion. There is no pneumothorax. Lines and tubes are in standard position. Calcified granulomas in the left upper lobe are again noted.
